t:
The thirteen year old girl stood before the villagers, accused of prostitution by the six men.


She knew very well that the truth was useless â€” that those six men

c:
She knew that justice won't be done. She knew that even if justice was done, by that time she won't be alive. Because she knew, how easy it was for the convicts to escape.
